title: Growth stocks to remain supported by strong tech earnings: Barclays
summary: Investing.com -- Barclays remains positive on Growth stocks, citing in a note on Tuesday, “Tech-led earnings strength and easing financial conditions,” while downgrading Value to negative amid “macro, market structure, and sector-specific headwinds.”
